virtual bool imm::IVideoController::SetCurrentFrame ( int  frameIndex)
pure virtual

Set index of current frame.

This works similiar to imm::IMediaController::SetCurrentPosition, but the parameter is frame index.

Implemented in iqtmm::CFrameSeqVideoControllerComp.
